pageProduct.name: Olay Luminous Whip UV SPF Face Cream Moisturiser 50g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Light as Air Finish

Tone Perfecting Essence (30mls)

Lightweight & fast absorption brightens & lightens skin tone, visibly reduces look of dark spots.

Regenerist Whip & Micro-Sculpting Night Cream (50g)

Maintains long-lasting moisture make the skin look plumper & radiant. Tighten pores and helps reduce wrinkles.

General Information

Olay Regenerist Luminous Whips Face Cream Moisturiser UV SPF 30 50g evens tone & reduces pores without greasiness. Light as air texture. 8 hour shine control. Lasting radiance without shine.


Features:
- Breakthrough Whip moisturiser delivers powerful skincare with a light as air finish
- 8 hour shine control with matte finish, instantly hydrates and primes skin for all-day makeup wear
-  Light as air texture. 8 hour shine control. Lasting radiance without shine
- In 2 weeks, evens skin tone & reduces appearance of pores. In 8 weeks, significantly reduces appearance of spots
- Exclusive Active Rush Technology actively holds & releases 1000X its weight in hydration
- Uniquely whipped formula with Pearl- Optics Technology (Inositol, Vitamin B3) Oil-Free. Non-Greasy. Absorbs instantly. Will not clog pores
- Broad spectrum SPF 30 brightening

Size: 50g

Oil-Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Olay Luminous Whip UV Active Face Cream Moisturiser with broad spectrum SPF 30 to brightening your face and neck without greasiness, Light as air texture, 8 hour shine control, Lasting radiance without shine
• Breakthrough Whip moisturizer delivers powerful skincare with a light as air finish
• Brightening formula, with Broad Spectrum SPF 25, evens skin tone and minimizes appearance of pores
• Made with Active Rush Technology to transform from cream to liquid on skin for instant absorption
• Uniquely whipped formula with Pearl- Optics™ Technology (Inositol, Vitamin B3)• Oil-Free. Non-Greasy. Absorbs instantly. Will not clog pores

Warnings

Avoid prolonged exposure in the sun. Wear protective clothing, hats and eyewear when exposed to the sun. Reapply product as often as necessary when exposed to the sun. For external use on unbroken skin only. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If skin irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. Contains phenoxyethanol and methyl hydroxybenzoate.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: ACTIVE INGREDIENTS:
Homosalate 8% w/w,
Octocrylene 5% w/w,
Octyl salicylate 4% w/w,
Butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane 3% w/w;
PRESERVATIVES: Phenoxyethanol and methyl hydroxybenzoate

Contains: Contains phenoxyethanol and methyl hydroxybenzoate.

Directions

Smooth evenly over your cleansed face and neck every morning.

USAGE ADVICE

Reapply product as of as necessary when exposed to the sun.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: 30°C
